20110106130211.000|20110106130212.000|CC1|U.S..

20110106130216.000|20110106130219.000|CC1|IT AND OTHER FIRMS OF A FAILURE 
20110106130219.000|20110106130220.000|CC1|OF MANAGEMENT.                  
20110106130220.000|20110106130222.000|CC1|IT IS SUGGESTING THAT THERE IS  
20110106130222.000|20110106130225.000|CC1|AN INDUSTRYWIDE PROBLEM.        
20110106130225.000|20110106130227.000|CC1|BP SAYS THAT THIS REPORT, LIKE  
20110106130227.000|20110106130231.000|CC1|ITS OWN INVESTIGATIONS, SAYS THE
20110106130231.000|20110106130233.000|CC1|ACCIDENT IS A RESULT OF MULTIPLE
20110106130233.000|20110106130234.000|CC1|FORCES, INVOLVING MULTIPLE      
20110106130234.000|20110106130235.000|CC1|COMPANIES.                      
20110106130235.000|20110106130239.000|CC1|>> THE OIL SPILL COMMISSION SET 
20110106130239.000|20110106130242.000|CC1|OUT TO SEE WHAT WENT WRONG AND  
20110106130242.000|20110106130243.000|CC1|WHO WAS TO BLAME.               
20110106130243.000|20110106130245.000|CC1|THE ANSWER, ALMOST EVERYTHING   
20110106130245.000|20110106130247.000|CC1|AND ALMOST EVERYONE.            
20110106130247.000|20110106130249.000|CC1|BP GOT MOST OF THE MEDIA        
20110106130249.000|20110106130251.000|CC1|COVERAGE, BUT THE PROBLEMS WERE 
20110106130251.000|20110106130252.000|CC1|FAR WIDER, ACCORDING TO THE     
20110106130252.000|20110106130253.000|CC1|REPORT.                         
20110106130253.000|20110106130255.000|CC1|THERE WAS POOR LEADERSHIP AND   
20110106130255.000|20110106130256.000|CC1|THAT COMMUNICATION BETWEEN THE  
20110106130256.000|20110106130259.000|CC1|RIG OPERATORS, INCLUDING        
20110106130259.000|20110106130301.000|CC1|TRANSOCEAN AND HALLIBURTON.     
20110106130301.000|20110106130304.000|CC1|MANY OF THE TECHNIQUES USED WERE
20110106130304.000|20110106130305.000|CC1|RISKIER THAN NECESSARY, BUT     
20110106130305.000|20110106130307.000|CC1|DESIGNED TO GET THINGS FINISHED 
20110106130307.000|20110106130309.000|CC1|FASTER AND CHEAPER.             
20110106130309.000|20110106130312.000|CC1|IMPORTANT SAFETY TESTS WERE     
20110106130312.000|20110106130315.000|CC1|CARRIED OUT BADLY OR NOT AT ALL.
20110106130315.000|20110106130316.000|CC1|THE REPORT CRITICIZES THE U.S.  
20110106130316.000|20110106130317.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT AND ITS WEAK         
20110106130317.000|20110106130318.000|CC1|OVERSIGHT OF THE OFFSHORE       
20110106130318.000|20110106130321.000|CC1|DRILLING INDUSTRY.              
20110106130321.000|20110106130323.000|CC1|THE NOW DEFUNCT REGULATOR, THE  
20110106130323.000|20110106130325.000|CC1|MINERALS MANAGEMENT SERVICE, A  
20110106130325.000|20110106130328.000|CC1|FAILED TO DO ITS JOB.           
20110106130328.000|20110106130330.000|CC1|THE THAMES TO GIVE THE AGENCY   
20110106130330.000|20110106130332.000|CC1|GREATER POWER HAD BEEN THWARTED 
20110106130332.000|20110106130334.000|CC1|IN THE PAST BY CONGRESS AND     
20110106130334.000|20110106130335.000|CC1|SEVERAL U.S. GOVERNMENTS.       
20110106130335.000|20110106130338.000|CC1|BP HAS RESPONDED TO THE REPORT  
20110106130338.000|20110106130340.000|CC1|AND SAID THAT THE COMPANY       
20110106130340.000|20110106130343.000|CC1|REPORTS -- SUPPORTS EFFORTS TO  
20110106130343.000|20110106130344.000|CC1|DETERMINE THE CAUSES OF THE     
20110106130344.000|20110106130346.000|CC1|DEEPWATER HORIZON ACCIDENT, AND 
20110106130346.000|20110106130348.000|CC1|CONCLUDES THAT THE ACCIDENT WAS

20110106130353.000|20110106130355.000|CC1|SUING SEVERAL OF THOSE          
20110106130355.000|20110106130356.000|CC1|COMPANIES, SEEKING DAMAGES OF   
20110106130356.000|20110106130359.000|CC1|AROUND $20 BILLION.

20110106130420.000|20110106130423.000|CC1|IT HARDER TO DRILL POLICE THE   
20110106130423.000|20110106130424.000|CC1|WELLS.

20110106130429.000|20110106130430.000|CC1|JOINS US NOW.

20110106130433.000|20110106130434.000|CC1|THERE IS AN INDUSTRYWIDE

20110106130434.000|20110106130438.000|CC1|>> WE NEED SOME PERSPECTIVE.    
20110106130438.000|20110106130440.000|CC1|AFTER ALL, SOMETHING LIKE 10,000
20110106130440.000|20110106130442.000|CC1|WELLS OR MORE HAVE BEEN DRILLED 
20110106130442.000|20110106130446.000|CC1|THROUGHOUT THE WORLD WITH VERY  
20110106130446.000|20110106130447.000|CC1|FEW PROBLEMS.

20110106130455.000|20110106130458.000|CC1|IS FAIRLY WELL AGREED.          
20110106130458.000|20110106130500.000|CC1|THE KEY FINDING, THE IMPORTANT  
20110106130500.000|20110106130502.000|CC1|FINDING HERE, IS NOT SO MUCH

20110106130505.000|20110106130506.000|CC1|IMPLEMENTED ON SITE.            
20110106130506.000|20110106130508.000|CC1|I WOULD AGREE, FROM WHAT I HAVE 
20110106130508.000|20110106130510.000|CC1|SEEN, THAT THERE ARE MAJOR      
20110106130510.000|20110106130512.000|CC1|FAILURES IN THE WAY INDIVIDUALS

20110106130513.000|20110106130515.000|CC1|THEY WERE SUPPOSED TO FOLLOW.   
20110106130515.000|20110106130517.000|CC1|>> I'M SORRY TO INTERRUPT.      
20110106130517.000|20110106130518.000|CC1|THE REASON IT COULD BE          
20110106130518.000|20110106130520.000|CC1|INDUSTRYWIDE, OF COURSE, IS     
20110106130520.000|20110106130520.000|CC1|BECAUSE COMPANIES ARE ALWAYS    
20110106130520.000|20110106130524.000|CC1|UNDER PRESSURE.

20110106130525.000|20110106130526.000|CC1|FAILURES THIS TIME.

20110106130529.000|20110106130532.000|CC1|BETWEEN COST AND RISK.          
20110106130532.000|20110106130535.000|CC1|HAVING WORKED WITH AN OIL       
20110106130535.000|20110106130536.000|CC1|COMPANY, SEVERAL COMPANIES,     
20110106130536.000|20110106130538.000|CC1|ACTUALLY, I KNOW THAT PEOPLE    
20110106130538.000|20110106130541.000|CC1|SERIOUSLY CONSIDER THE RISKS AND
20110106130541.000|20110106130544.000|CC1|THE COSTS.

20110106130546.000|20110106130548.000|CC1|THERE IS THE ISSUE OF COST.     
20110106130548.000|20110106130549.000|CC1|THAT'S ALWAYS BOUNCED AGAINST   
20110106130549.000|20110106130550.000|CC1|THE RISK.                       
20110106130550.000|20110106130551.000|CC1|EVERYONE KNOWS THAT IF YOU GET  
20110106130551.000|20110106130553.000|CC1|IT WRONG, THERE ARE MAJOR       
20110106130553.000|20110106130555.000|CC1|PROBLEMS.

20110106130616.000|20110106130618.000|CC1|YOU NEED A GOOD REGULATORY

20110106130624.000|20110106130626.000|CC1|THE COMPANY.

20110106130629.000|20110106130631.000|CC1|WHAT HAS COME ACROSS IS THAT    
20110106130631.000|20110106130633.000|CC1|NOBODY, IN A SENSE, HAD A

20110106130641.000|20110106130643.000|CC1|WE SOLVE THESE PARTICULAR

20110106130656.000|20110106130659.000|CC1|>> IS IT NOT SYMPTOMATIC OF THE 
20110106130659.000|20110106130701.000|CC1|PROBLEM THAT WE HAVE THE REPORT 
20110106130701.000|20110106130702.000|CC1|FROM MEMBERS OF THE HOUSE OF    
20110106130702.000|20110106130704.000|CC1|PARLIAMENT THAT SAY IF A SIMILAR
20110106130704.000|20110106130706.000|CC1|INCIDENT HAPPENED IN THE NORTH  
20110106130706.000|20110106130709.000|CC1|SEA, FOR EXAMPLE, IN VERY DEEP  
20110106130709.000|20110106130711.000|CC1|WATERS, THE COMPANIES WOULD NOT 
20110106130711.000|20110106130714.000|CC1|BE ABLE TO COPE?                
20110106130714.000|20110106130716.000|CC1|>> THERE ARE TWO ISSUES HERE.   
20110106130716.000|20110106130718.000|CC1|ONE IS HAVING THE HARDWARE      
20110106130718.000|20110106130718.000|CC1|AVAILABLE.                      
20110106130718.000|20110106130722.000|CC1|THAT'S AN IMPORTANT POINT FOR   
20110106130722.000|20110106130726.000|CC1|THE GOVERNMENT MP'S TO HAVE     
20110106130726.000|20110106130726.000|CC1|MADE.                           
20110106130726.000|20110106130728.000|CC1|WE NEED TO ASK OTHER FACILITIES 
20110106130728.000|20110106130730.000|CC1|TO BE ABLE TO DO THIS.

20110106130732.000|20110106130733.000|CC1|THE TRAINING RIGHT?

20110106130820.000|20110106130820.000|CC1|FAKE.                           
20110106130820.000|20110106130822.000|CC1|HIS MOTIVES ARE UNCLEAR, BUT HE 
20110106130822.000|20110106130824.000|CC1|IS THOUGHT TO HAVE              
20110106130824.000|20110106130825.000|CC1|PSYCHOLOGICAL PROBLEMS.         
20110106130825.000|20110106130826.000|CC1|>> NEWS OF THE ATTEMPTED        
20110106130826.000|20110106130829.000|CC1|HIJACKING BEGAN TO UNFOLD AT THE
20110106130829.000|20110106130830.000|CC1|AIRPORT IN ISTANBUL.            
20110106130830.000|20110106130832.000|CC1|A TURKISH AIRLINES FLIGHT HAD   
20110106130832.000|20110106130834.000|CC1|BEEN HOMEWARD BOUND FROM OSLO   
20110106130834.000|20110106130835.000|CC1|WHEN IT APPEARED A MAN HAD TRIED

20110106130840.000|20110106130842.000|CC1|THERE WERE ABOUT 60 PASSENGERS  
20110106130842.000|20110106130843.000|CC1|ON BOARD.                       
20110106130843.000|20110106130848.000|CC1|>> [SPEAKING FOR LANGUAGE]      
20110106130848.000|20110106130849.000|CC1|>> WE WERE VERY SCARED.         
20110106130849.000|20110106130851.000|CC1|I THOUGHT IT WAS A DRUNK PERSON 
20110106130851.000|20110106130852.000|CC1|AT FIRST.                       
20110106130852.000|20110106130854.000|CC1|THEN I REALIZED IT WAS NOT.
